card_text: Apply 1 of these effects. Unless you have a "Vaalmonica" card in your Pendulum Zone, your opponent chooses the effect.$N●Gain 500 LP, then you can place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 2 cards.$N●Take 500 damage, then you can add 1 "Vaalmonica" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Vaalmonica Scelta".$NYou can only activate 1 "Vaalmonica Scelta" per turn.
